ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.ModelTests

Class ClaimItemListTest

  • java.lang.Object
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.ModelTests.ClaimItemListTest

  • public class ClaimItemListTest
extends
    Tests the functionality of the claim List. It tests the claimList's ability to add claims, remove claims, filter by tags, index the list, remove claims at a specific index, that the listener interacts with it, and that it can be created. User Stories Tested: US01.01.01, US01.02.01 US01.05.01 US03.03.01 US02.02.01 General use case can be found on the wiki at https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/wiki/User-Stories-and-Requirements All tests should pass

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testAddRemove()
      This tests the claim list's ability to add and remove it's Claims Tests US01.01.01, US01.02.01
      void testFilter()
      Tests the filter function, such that given an array of Tags, the correct claims are returned.
      void testIndexList()
      Used for the filter function, to get the correct claim indices.
      void testIndexRemoval()
      Tests that a specific claim can be removed or accessed from the claim list via index without error.
      void testListeners()
      Tests that the listener interacts with the claim list.
      void testSetUp()
      This tests that a claimList can be constructed correctly either from scratch or from an existing ArrayList Tests US01.01.01, US01.02.01
      void testSort()
      Test the claim sort function.
      void testView()
      Test that a user can "View" a claim and it's details Tests US01.03.01, US02.01.01

        public void testIndexList()
                   throws EmptyFieldException,
                          InvalidDateException
        Used for the filter function, to get the correct claim indices. We basically want to put in a subset of the whole list and get an array of the correct indexes of that list, in order.
